name: Donna Brave: Paris Strangler
storyline: Your uncle’s friends have been mysteriously murdered, and he’s called you to Paris to track down the killer, before they strike again! But soon you’ll find what you’re hunting is no ordinary criminal. A mystical monster is on the loose, and it’s after your uncle! Can you save him in time, or will you become the next victim? Find out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!
summary:
Mad Head Games proudly presents the all-new, thrilling Donna Brave series!

Investigate a new string of murders in the bonus game!
Earn awesome achievements as you play.
Challenge yourself to collect every rune and play the ultimate HOP!
Keep an eye out for collectible morphing objects.
Enjoy exclusive character icons, concept art, soundtrack, and more!
